E.name: Schema
E.desc: Transgenesis uses this element to identify the schema root

A.name: name
A.desc: The name of the schema as it appears on the main menu

E.name: Enum
E.desc: Defines a custom value type for attributes

A.name: name
A.desc: The name of the enum type

E.name: E
E.desc: Defines the root-level element of a data file

A.name: class
A.desc: "root" (can be instantiated) or "virtual" (can be inherited) but not both

A.name: module
A.desc: Makes this element a module reference. Specifies the attribute that contains the module path

A.name: inherit
A.desc: Inherit subelements and attributes from a virtual element (or one of its descendants)

A.name: value
A.desc: The default value of the attribute

A.name: type
A.desc: The value type of the attribute - can be an Enum type

A.name: count
A.desc: The number of instances that you can have
